channel.title: E-MAIL on Time is life with tech
channel.description: Recent content in E-MAIL on Time is life with tech

item.title: Pharming and Phising
item.description: Pharming Pharming A victim is redirected to a malicious website by modifying the hosts file or by exploiting DNS servers. DNS改ざんにより大規模に不正サイトにアクセスさせる手法 Phishing An attacker sends e-mail with a URL which has malicious link similar to the popular actual websites. メールアドレスに不正リンクなどをつけ、個別の利用者を不正アクセスへ誘
